title: Creating an Emotional Connection
objective: Build authentic emotional connection through empathy, curiosity, and personalization—so the guest feels understood, safe, and excited to move forward with confidence.
position_in_journey: Discovery → Selection → Emotional Connection (before/through Test Drive and Decision)
learning_outcomes: Use empathy + curiosity to make guests feel understood (not managed).
Identify emotional drivers behind stated needs (the 'why behind the what').
Use future pacing and sensory language to make benefits feel real.
Create confidence without pressure using permission-based language.
Build a 'shared mission' tone: we are solving this together.
Use a simple emotional test drive flow with consistent check-ins.
